title: Innocent in Her Enemy's Bed
description: Getting in bed with the enemy is the sweetest revenge in this scorching enemies-to-lovers romance by USA TODAY bestselling author Dani Collins.Keeping her enemy close……means getting far closer than she thought!Ilona Callas is aware that Leander Vasilou will do anything for revenge against her stepfamily. She just never pictured herself becoming the formidable Greek businessman’s ally! Yet uniting with Leander will give Ilona freedom and financial independence for the first time.Since clawing his way to the top after being betrayed, Leander exists alone. Ilona should be his ticket to vengeance…until an explosive moment of intimacy changes everything. So begins a sensual back-and-forth that will lead to one their marriage bed!From Harlequin Escape to exotic locations where passion knows no bounds.
author: Dani Collins
